data.name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid - Ryu Angel Grove Class of '93 Skin
data.detailed_description: This unlocks Ryu - Angel Grove Class of '93 Skin, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid
data.about_the_game: This unlocks Ryu - Angel Grove Class of '93 Skin, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid
data.short_description: This unlocks Ryu - Angel Grove Class of '93 Skin, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

fullgame.name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 @ 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GTS 512
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-Bit Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K @ 3.50GHz or AMD FX-9370
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
